remarks: The collection of all sets equinumerous to a set ` A ` and having the least possible rank is a set.  This is the part of the justification of the definition of kard of [Enderton] p. 222.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2003.)
statement:
kardex $p |- { x | ( x ~~ A /\ A. y ( y ~~ A -> ( rank ` x ) C_ ( rank ` y ) ) ) } e. _V $.
$d A x y $.
